#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int num[55][55];

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;

	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;

		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		{
			for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j)
			{
				cin>>num[i][j];
			}
		}

		bool flag = true;

		for (int i = 0; i < n-1 ; ++i)
		{
			int x = num[i][0] - num[i+1][0];

			for (int j = 1; j < n; ++j)
			{
				if (x != (num[i][j] - num[i+1][j]))
				{
					flag = false;
					break;
				}
			}

			if(flag == false )
			{
				break;
			}
		}

		if(flag == true)
		{
			cout<<"Yes\n";
		}
		else
		{
			cout<<"No\n";
		}


	}

	return 0;
}
